00090             function                get_grid_header( $id )
00091             {
00092                   try
00093                   {
00094                         $Code = '<div style="display: none;" id="history_'.$id.'"><table style="width: 100%"><tr>'.
00095                               '<td class="table_header">{lang:history_date}</td><td class="table_header">'.
00096                               '{lang:history_time}</td><td class="table_header">{lang:history_author}</td>'.
00097                               '<td class="table_header">{lang:history_field_name}</td>'.
00098                               '<td class="table_header">{lang:history_field_value_before}</td>'.
00099                               '<td class="table_header">{lang:history_field_value_after}</td></tr>';
00100                               
00101                         return( $Code );
00102                   }
00103                   catch( Exception $e )
00104                   {
00105                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00106                   }

00131             function                get_grid_lines( &$Changes )
00132             {
00133                   try
00134                   {
00135                         $Lines = array();
00136                         $Previous = array();
00137                         
00138                         foreach( $Changes as $i => $Change )
00139                         {
00140                               $Time = strtotime( get_field( $Change , 'creation_date' ) );
00141                               $Class = 'table_row_'.( $i % 2 ? 'even' : 'odd' );
00142                               $Code  = '<tr class="grid_row"><td class="'.$Class.'">'.date( 'd.m.y' , $Time ).'</td>';
00143                               $Code .= '<td class="'.$Class.'">'.date( 'H:i:s' , $Time ).'</td>';
00144                               $Code .= '<td class="'.$Class.'">'.get_field( $Change , 'author_name' ).'</td>';
00145                               $FieldName = get_field( $Change , 'field_name' );
00146                               $Code .= "<td class=\"$Class\">$FieldName</td>";
00147                               $Code .= '<td class="'.$Class.'">'.get_field( $Previous , $FieldName , '-' ).'</td>';
00148                               $FieldValue = get_field( $Change , 'field_value' );
00149                               $Code .= "<td class=\"$Class\">$FieldValue</td>";
00150                               $Previous[ $FieldName ] = $FieldValue;
00151                               $Lines [] = $Code;
00152                         }
00153                         
00154                         return( implode( '' , array_reverse( $Lines ) ) );
00155                   }
00156                   catch( Exception $e )
00157                   {
00158                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00159                   }
00160             }
00161             
00188             function                get_changes_grid( $id , $ObjectType )
00189             {
00190                   try
00191                   {
00192                         $Changes = $this->ChangeHistoryAcces->get_history( $id , $ObjectType );
00193                         
00194                         if( isset( $Changes[ 0 ] ) )
00195                         {
00196                               $Code = $this->get_grid_header( $id );
00197                               $Code .= $this->get_grid_lines( $Changes );
00198                               $Code = "$Code</table></div>";
00199                         }
00200                         else
00201                         {
00202                               $Code = '<div style="display: none;" id="history_'.$id.'" style="text-align: center;">'.
00203                                           '{lang:data_for_grid_was_not_found}</div>';
00204                         }
00205                         
00206                         return( $Code );
00207                   }
00208                   catch( Exception $e )
00209                   {
00210                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00211                   }
00212             }
00213       }
